mainBoard.flavorText: Quick and agile, Amrou Kithkin can usually escape from even the most fearsome opponents.
mainBoard.name: Amrou Kithkin
mainBoard.originalText: Creatures with power greater than 2 may not be assigned to block Kithkin. Blocker's power may be increased after blocking has been assigned.

rulings.text: A creature with power 3 or greater can’t be declared as a blocker for Amrou Kithkin. If the power of a creature that’s already blocking Amrou Kithkin is increased to 3 or greater, it will continue to block Amrou Kithkin.

mainBoard.text: This creature can't be blocked by creatures with power 3 or greater.

mainBoard.flavorText: Benalia has a complex caste system that changes with the lunar year. No matter what the season, the only caste that cannot be attained by either heredity or money is that of the hero.
mainBoard.name: Benalish Hero

rulings.text: A maximum of one nonbanding creature can join an attacking band no matter how many creatures with banding are in it.
Creatures in the same band must all attack the same player or planeswalker.

If a creature with banding attacks, it can team up with any number of other attacking creatures with banding (and up to one nonbanding creature) and attack as a unit called a "band." The band can be blocked by any creature that could block a single creature in the band. Blocking any creature in a band blocks the entire band. If a creature with banding is blocked, the attacking player chooses how the blockers' damage is assigned.
If a creature in combat has banding, its controller assigns damage for creatures blocking or blocked by it.

mainBoard.text: Banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)

foreignData.name: Entzauberung
foreignData.text: Zerstöre eine Verzauberung oder ein Artefakt.

mainBoard.name: Disenchant
mainBoard.originalText: Target enchantment or artifact is destroyed.

rulings.text: This is not modal. If the target changes from an artifact to an enchantment or vice versa, this still destroys it.

foreignData.name: Heilige Rüstung
foreignData.text:
Die verzauberte Kreatur erhält +0/+2.
{W}: Die verzauberte Kreatur erhält +0/+1 bis zum Ende des Zuges.

mainBoard.name: Holy Armor
mainBoard.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +0/+2.
{W}: Enchanted creature gets +0/+1 until end of turn.

foreignData.name: Stein der Sanftmut
foreignData.text: Keine Kreatur mit einer Stärke größer als 2 kann während der Enttap-Phase enttappt werden.

mainBoard.name: Meekstone
mainBoard.originalText: Any creature with power greater than 2 may not be untapped as normal during the untap phase.
mainBoard.text: Creatures with power 3 or greater don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.

mainBoard.flavorText: Before a woman marries in the village of Sursi, she must visit the land of the Mesa Pegasus. Legend has it that if the woman is pure of heart and her love is true, a Mesa Pegasus will appear, blessing her family with long life and good fortune.
mainBoard.name: Mesa Pegasus

mainBoard.flavorText: "As the cavalry bore down, we faced them with swords drawn and pikes hidden in the grass at our feet. 'Don't lift your pikes 'til I give the word,' I said." —Maeveen O'Donagh, *Memoirs of a Soldier*
mainBoard.name: Pikemen

mainBoard.flavorText: Healers ultimately acquire the divine gifts of spiritual and physical wholeness. The most devout are also granted the ability to pass physical wholeness on to others.

foreignData.name: Feldscher
foreignData.text: {T}: Verhinderte einen Schadenspunkt bei einer Kreatur oder einem Spieler.

mainBoard.name: Samite Healer
mainBoard.originalText: ocT: Prevent 1 damage to any target.
mainBoard.text: {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.

mainBoard.flavorText: The traditional kings of the jungle command a healthy respect in other climates as well. Relying mainly on their stealth and speed, Savannah Lions can take a victim by surprise, even in the endless, flat plains of their homeland.
mainBoard.name: Savannah Lions

foreignData.name: Schwerter zu Pflugscharen
foreignData.text: Nimm eine Kreatur ganz aus dem Spiel. Ihr Beherrscher erhält dafür so viele Lebenspunkte wie die Kreatur Stärke hatte.

mainBoard.name: Swords to Plowshares
mainBoard.originalText: Target creature is removed from game entirely. Creature's controller gains life points equal to creature's power.

rulings.text: Use the power of the creature from when it was last on the battlefield to determine how much life is gained.

mainBoard.text: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.

mainBoard.flavorText: When Urza's war machines became too costly, Tawnos's weaponry replaced them.
mainBoard.name: Tawnos's Weaponry
mainBoard.originalText: {2}: Target creature gains +1/+1 as long as Tawnos's Weaponry remains tapped. You may choose not to untap Tawnos's Weaponry during untap phase.
mainBoard.text:
You may choose not to untap this artifact during your untap step.
{2}, {T}: Target creature gets +1/+1 for as long as this artifact remains tapped.

foreignData.name: Umwandlung
foreignData.text:
Alle Gebirge werden zu Standard-Ebenen.
Zahle während Deiner Versorgungsphase WW oder vernichte die Umwandlung.

sideBoard.name: Conversion
sideBoard.originalText: All mountains are considered basic plains while Conversion is in play. Pay {W}{W} during upkeep or Conversion is discarded.

rulings.text: The Conversion effect is a continuous effect. There is no chance to tap a just-played mountain for red mana before it becomes a plains.
Will not add or remove the supertype snow to or from a land.

sideBoard.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice this enchantment unless you pay {W}{W}.
All Mountains are Plains.

foreignData.name: Karma
foreignData.text: Karma fügt jedem Spieler während seiner Versorgungsphase pro Sumpf, den der jeweilige Spieler im Spiel hat, einen Schadenspunkt zu.

sideBoard.name: Karma
sideBoard.originalText: During a player's upkeep, Karma does 1 point of damage to that player for each swamp he or she has in play.

rulings.text: Amount of damage is determined when the ability resolves and not when it is placed on the stack.

sideBoard.text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, this enchantment deals damage to that player equal to the number of Swamps they control.
